algoliaRecords.description: Information about the Edexcel GCSE in D&T - Food Technology (2009) for students and teachers, including the specification and key documents.
algoliaRecords.title: Design and Technology - Food Technology (2009)
algoliaRecords.content:
Here, you'll find everything you need to study for or to teach the Edexcel GCSE in Design and Technology - Food Technology, including key documents and the latest news.

Students of our Edexcel GCSE in Food Technology will learn about a wide range of topics including special diets, sports nutrition, sustainability, and multi-cultural and celebration foods, designing food products and testing and tasting their ideas.

algoliaRecords.description: Information about the Edexcel GCSE in Statistics (2009) for students and teachers, including the specification, key documents and the latest news.
algoliaRecords.title: Statistics (2009)
algoliaRecords.content:
Here, you'll find everything you need to study for or to teach the Edexcel GCSE in Statistics, including key documents and the latest news.

Students of our Edexcel GCSE in Statistics will learn statistical techniques and concepts such as planning and data collection, processing, representing and analysing data, reasoning, interpreting and discussing results, and understanding probability.

algoliaRecords.description: Information about the Edexcel GCSE in Business (2009) for students and teachers, including the specification, key documents and the latest news.
algoliaRecords.title: Business (2009)
algoliaRecords.content:
Here, you'll find everything you need to study for or to teach the Edexcel GCSE in Business, including key documents and the latest news.

Students of our Edexcel GCSE in Business will take a critical approach to business and economics, focusing on topics such as building a business, business communications, and the extent to which business and economic activity can be ethical and sustainable.

algoliaRecords.description: Information about the Edexcel GCSE in Astronomy (2009) for students and teachers, including the specification, key documents and the latest news.
algoliaRecords.title: Astronomy (2009)
algoliaRecords.content:
Here, you'll find everything you need to study for or to teach the Edexcel GCSE in Astronomy, including key documents and the latest news.

Students of our Edexcel GCSE in Astronomy will learn the theory and practice of understanding the universe, taking an informed interest in current astronomical investigations, discoveries and space exploration.

algoliaRecords.description: Information about the Edexcel GCSE in Japanese (2009) for students and teachers, including the specification, key documents and the latest news.
algoliaRecords.title: Japanese (2009)
algoliaRecords.content:
Here, you'll find everything you need to study for or to teach the Edexcel GCSE in Japanese, including key documents and the latest news.

Students of our Edexcel GCSE in Japanese will learn to speak, listen, read, write and communicate effectively in Japanese, as well as develop awareness and understanding of countries and communities where Japanese is spoken.

Students of our Edexcel GCSE in Italian will learn to speak, listen, read, write and communicate effectively in Italian, as well as develop awareness and understanding of countries and communities where Italian is spoken.
